description:
When you are unable (or unwilling) to carry a chain or cable to lock up your wheels, these locking skewers will do the trick. They replace your original quick release or bolt skewers and can only be loosened or tightened using a unique proprietary circular key. The skewers are long enough to fit most bikes but can can be shortened using a hacksaw or angle grinder if necessary.

  • 11,200 key combinations
  • Lifetime key replacement
  • Set includes front and rear wheel locking skewers
  • Can be shortened with a hacksaw or angle grinder
name: Pinhead Wheel Lock Set (2 Pack)
